channel.title: PI - Making 562 default gameframe for client?
channel.description: how do i make the 562 gameframe default in my PI client? i just wana get rid of the other game frames so the cache gets smaller..

item.title: PI - Making 562 default gameframe for client?
item.dc:creator: @CPUsquad CPUsquad
item.description:
@CPUsquad wrote:

i konw im saying is there any way to like get rid of all that extra stuff from cache … and making certain things like x10 hits and 562 gameframe default for my client to reduce my cache size

Read full topic

item.title: PI - Making 562 default gameframe for client?

item.description:
@lover854 wrote:

dude that are just sprites :+ that doesnt make your cache big:P like 602 anims/gfxs 602 npc etc that makes your cache big
